full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 142 of 247 270 LBUVMAX4 Visoski - cross 1 THE COURT: And when I do that, I'll ask the sketch artist not to draw exact likeness of that witness, consistent with my ruling. 2 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. 3 THE COURT: Okay. Thank you. 4 MS. COMEY: Nothing further. 5 THE COURT: Mr. Everdell? 6 MR. EVERDELL: Nothing from the defense, your Honor. 7 THE COURT: Okay. We can bring the witness back. 8 And Ms. Williams, please bring in the jury. 9 (Jury present) 10 THE COURT: Members of the jury, I hope you had a pleasant lunch. Thank you. 11 THE LAW CLERK: Judge, one second. 12 THE COURT: All right. Thank you. 13 Everyone, I hope you had a good lunch. Thank you for your continued attention and diligence. 14 Mr. Everdell, you may continue with your cross-examination of Mr. Visoski. 15 Mr. Visoski, I remind you you are under oath. 16 THE WITNESS: Yes, ma'am. 17 THE COURT: Go ahead. 18 MR. EVERDELL: Thank you, your Honor. 19 LAWRENCE VISOSKI, resumed. 20 BY MR. EVERDELL: 21 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011914
